name: AC April of Fools 2022
description:
Short little point and click game for a Discord server event. Wanted to get more characters and content in, but was only able to rush in so much. Development and art all done over the span of  week, just under 24 hours total time.

Compatibility: Tested and working on PC and iPad.

Instructions: 

  • Find items, and use them to prank the cafe staff/patrons!
  • Can only hold 3 items at a time
  • Total of only 5 items for 5 pranks
  • There's no ending text or anything, so when you're done you're done

Credits:

Items, characters, and animations drawn by me, and I coded and developed the whole game. Everything else I relied on free resources, creative commons is awesome.
